body:
I don't have `CC` set. `which gcc` points to the standard Apple frontend and all the other commands listed point to the standard `gcc` frontend.

However, I do have `GCC` set to this `/usr/local/gfortran/bin/gcc` a non-standard compiler version 4.8.2 from here ( https://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/GFortranBinaries#MacOS ).
